name: RICE Prioritization
description: Prioritize features using Reach, Impact, Confidence, Effort

fields.label: Feature Name
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Suggest a clear, concise feature name based on context

fields.label: Reach (users/month)
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Estimate monthly user reach based on target segment and available data

fields.label: Impact
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Assess impact level (0.25-3) based on user pain points and strategic importance

fields.label: Confidence (%)
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Rate confidence (0-100%) in the reach and impact estimates

fields.label: Rationale
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Provide rationale for this prioritization decision based on the scores
